languages.text: "Постойте! Сам Инквизитор благословил меня использовать ксеносов по моему разумению. Почему меня в чем-то обвиняют?"

traits.locale_text: "Постойте! Сам Инквизитор благословил меня использовать ксеносов по моему разумению. Почему меня в чем-то обвиняют?"

languages.text: "Wait! The Inquisitor himself gave me his blessing to use xenos as I saw fit. Why, then, am I standing trial?"
languages.original_text: "Постойте! Сам Инквизитор благословил меня использовать ксеносов по моему разумению. Почему меня в чем-то обвиняют?"

traits.locale_text: "Wait! The Inquisitor himself blessed me to use the xenos as I see fit. Why do you accuse me in the first place?"
"Wait! The Inquisitor himself blessed me to use the xenos as I see fit. Why do you accuse me in the first place?"
"Wait! The Inquisitor himself blessed me to use the xenos as I saw fit. Why do you accuse me in the first place?"
"Wait! The Inquisitor himself blessed me to use the xenos as I saw fit. Why do you accuse me in the first place?"
"Wait! The Inquisitor himself gave me his blessing to use xenos as I saw fit. Why, then, am I standing trial?"
"Wait! The Inquisitor himself gave me his blessing to use xenos as I saw fit. Why, then, am I standing trial?"

languages.text: « Attendez ! L'inquisiteur en personne m'a donné l'autorisation d'utiliser les xénos comme je l'entendais. À quoi riment ces accusations ? »
languages.original_text: "Wait! The Inquisitor himself gave me his blessing to use xenos as I saw fit. Why, then, am I standing trial?"

traits.locale_text: « Attendez ! L'inquisiteur en personne m'a donné l'autorisation d'utiliser les xénos comme je l'entendais. Pourquoi m'accusez-vous dans ce cas ? »

languages.text: “等等！是大审判官本人亲自允许，说我可以在合适的情况下利用异形的力量。你为什么要指控我？”
languages.original_text: "Wait! The Inquisitor himself gave me his blessing to use xenos as I saw fit. Why, then, am I standing trial?"

traits.locale_text: “等等！是审判长本人亲自允许，说我可以在合适的情况下利用异形的力量。你为什么要指控我？”

languages.text: 「待ってくれ！私が異種族を好きに利用していたことは、異端審問官自ら賛美していたんだ。そもそも、なぜ君が私を非難する？」
languages.original_text: "Wait! The Inquisitor himself gave me his blessing to use xenos as I saw fit. Why, then, am I standing trial?"

traits.locale_text: 「待ってくれ！私が異種族を好きに利用していたことは、異端審問官自ら賛美していたんだ。そもそも、なぜ君が私を非難する？」

languages.text: "Wartet! Der Inquisitor selbst hat mir seinen Segen gegeben, die Xenos einzusetzen, wie ich es für richtig hielt. Warum also macht man mir den Prozess?"
languages.original_text: "Wait! The Inquisitor himself gave me his blessing to use xenos as I saw fit. Why, then, am I standing trial?"

traits.locale_text: "Wartet! Der Inquisitor selbst segnete mich, die Xenos zu benutzen, wie ich es für richtig hielt. Warum klagt Ihr mich überhaupt an?"

languages.text: «¡Un momento! ¡El mismo Inquisidor me otorgó su bendición para usar a los xenos como estimara oportuno. Entonces, ¿por qué se me juzga ahora?».
languages.original_text: "Wait! The Inquisitor himself gave me his blessing to use xenos as I saw fit. Why, then, am I standing trial?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Espere! El propio inquisidor me dio su beneplácito para usar a los xenos como estimase oportuno. ¿Por qué se me acusa a mí?».

languages.text: "Bekle! Zenoları uygun gördüğüm şekilde kullanabileceğimi bana bizzat Engizisyoncu söyledi. Bu durumda neden yargılanıyorum?"
languages.original_text: "Wait! The Inquisitor himself gave me his blessing to use xenos as I saw fit. Why, then, am I standing trial?"

traits.locale_text: "Bekle! Zenoları uygun gördüğüm şekilde kullanabileceğimi bana bizzat Engizisyoncu söyledi. Bu durumda neden yargılanıyorum?"
